price: Unser Herr, vergib mir und meinen Eltern und den Gläubigen an dem Tag, da die Abrechnung stattfinden wird.
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
